translations.No recent status changes: Hakuna mabadiliko ya hali ya hivi karibuni
translations.Emoji for your status message: Emoji kwa hali yako ya ujumbe
translations.There was an error saving the status: Kulikuwa na hitilafu katika kuhifadhi hali
translations.There was an error clearing the status: Kulikuwa na hitilafu katika kufuta hali
translations.There was an error reverting the status: Kulikuwa na hitilafu katika kurejesha hali
translations.Set absence period and replacement: Weka kipindi cha kutokuwepo na uingizwaji mbadala
translations.Your status was set automatically: Hadhi yako ilipangiliwa moja kwa moja
translations.There was an error saving the new status: Kulikuwa na hitilafu katika kuhifadhi hali mpya
